summary: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.
cast: Molly Ringwald|Harry Dean Stanton|Jon Cryer|Annie Potts|James Spader|Andrew McCarthy|Jim Haynie|Alexa Kenin|Kate Vernon|Andrew Dice Clay|Emily Longstreth|Margaret Colin|Jamie Anders|Gina Gershon|Bader Howar|Christian Jacobs|Audre Johnston|Melanie Manos|Maggie Roswell|Dweezil Zappa|Jimmer Podrasky|Tommy Blatnick|Timothy J.|Terry Wilson|Bruno Coon|Jeffrey Hollie|Kevin Ricard|David Sutton|Kevin T. Williams|Rock Deadrick|Karen E. Laine|Kristy Swanson|Kevin D. Lindsay|James Huffman|Richard Patrick|Kimberly L. Ryusaki|Steve Sussman|William Winckler
title: La chica de rosa
